com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.util
Class SystemUiHiderHoneycomb

java.lang.Object
  com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.util.SystemUiHider
      com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.util.SystemUiHiderBase
          com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.util.SystemUiHiderHoneycomb

public class SystemUiHiderHoneycomb
extends SystemUiHiderBase

An API 11+ implementation of SystemUiHider. Uses APIs available in Honeycomb and later (specifically View.setSystemUiVisibility(int)) to show and hide the system UI.

private int mTestFlags

mVisible

Whether or not the system UI is currently visible. This is cached from View.OnSystemUiVisibilityChangeListener.
